para: When Hide_Empty_Mesh_Elements is on, &elems; of a &mesh; which have no assigned &material; are not drawn by any . Some display methods, such as , never draw these elements in any case, even if Hide_Empty_Mesh_Elements is off.

note.para: The default value of Hide_Empty_Mesh_Elements is True. If a &mesh; doesn't appear in the graphics window, ensure that the elements aren't empty, or that empty elements are being shown.

caption.simpara: (a) A µ with a &material; assigned only to the blue pixels, and a &skel; created from it.
(b) A &mesh; created from the &skel; in (a), with a contour plot displayed on it. Hide_Empty_Mesh_Elements is False.
(c) The same &mesh; and contour plot as in (b), but Hide_Empty_Mesh_Elements is True.
